about_the_game:
After installing this DLC, the game will have a new feature locally: opening the modifier interface. The modifier has the following functions:

Control switch for all enemy spawns, allowing you to completely turn off enemies, delete all enemies, and focus on base building.
Manually control the spawning of a specific number of enemies or allies, or third or fourth parties, at specified locations.
Unlock all producible items. Increase production speed. Generate common consumables.
Generate vehicles and mechs at any time.
Quickly restore team members' health.
Enhance weapon power.
In summary, this DLC makes the game more straightforward and efficient, especially when you need to start a fast-paced multiplayer battle party.
